title: CoffeeScript
description: This example course will introduce CoffeeScript

lectures.title: Lecture 1: What is CoffeeScript?
lectures.summary: This initial lecture will explain the history of CoffeeScript and the uses it has.
lectures.submitSuccess: Now, that was easy! The next lecture will show you how to loop over data.
lectures.submitFailure: This is not the statement we are looking for.
lectures.codeHint:
The correct solution is 
 ```coffee
console.log 'Hello World!'
```.
lectures.codeHintText: To write to the console, use `console.log`. A string looks like this: `'a String'`.
lectures.taskText: Find a way of writing `'Hello World!'` to the console.
